body_html:
I think it would be cleaner to isolate the platform dependent code in a little utility to avoid code duplication:

inline int32 MaybeByteSwapInt32(int32 x) {
#if (__BYTE_ORDER__ == __ORDER_BIG_ENDIAN__)
   return le32toh(x);
#else 
  return x;
}

and pass the values through that unconditionally.
